level.heading: SERVICES AND SUPPORTS[COLON] STANDARDS FOR CORE REQUIREMENTS — INDIVIDUALSYCHOTHERAPY (ยง 29-2342)

level.text: Individual psychotherapy shall only be performed by either a:
Licensed psychiatric nurse or nurse practitioner;
Licensed individual clinical social worker; and/or
Licensed professional with specific training in psychotherapy.
Only a child specialist shall provide psychotherapy to children under the age of 13 years.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9341 (November 24, 2000), adopting Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7708, 7768 (September 22, 2000).
